currentNews.title: Shakespeare's Globe announces 2026 season
currentNews.summary: The reconstructed Globe Theatre reveals its 2026 summer program featuring fresh interpretations of the classics.

currentNews.title: RSC's Hamlet embarks on UK tour
currentNews.summary: The Royal Shakespeare Company brings its acclaimed production of Hamlet to venues across Britain.

currentNews.title: New Folger exhibition explores Shakespeare's sources
currentNews.summary: The Folger Shakespeare Library opens 'Before the Bard: Shakespeare's Source Texts' featuring rare manuscripts.
